definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: A valuable road map for understanding and healing cybersex addictions.
sentences.chinese: 一個網絡性愛的理解和治療吸毒成癮寶貴的路線圖。

sentences.english: Until now, the rats under study have met two of the three elements of addiction.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，研究中的大鼠符合成癮三要素當中的二項。

sentences.english: ROBERT C. MALENKA and ERIC J. NESTLER study the molecular basis of drug addiction.
sentences.chinese: 曼能克與內斯特兩人研究的是藥物成癮的分子機制。

sentences.english: So could compulsive buying be an addiction disorder?
sentences.chinese: 那麼強迫購買行爲是一種成癮症嗎？

sentences.english: Schoolboys are easier to be addicted than schoolgirls to net.
sentences.chinese: 男生比女生更容易上網成癮。

sentences.english: There is not one explanation for the cause or origin of addiction.
sentences.chinese: 對於成癮症的成因或起源，並沒有公認的解釋。

sentences.english: With stimulants in particular, like meth and cocaine, they suppress the appetite.
sentences.chinese: 成癮性藥物，例如冰毒和可卡因，可以破壞食慾。

sentences.english: Epidemic Status and Countermeasure of Clonorchiasis in Guangxi;
sentences.chinese: 提出了“成癮型”流行區華支睾吸蟲病的防制對策。

sentences.english: 4The Smiths regarded their daughter ' s addiction to drugs as a family skeleton.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯夫婦把女兒吸毒成癮視爲家醜。

sentences.english: I want to write about people addicted to drugs.
sentences.chinese: 我想寫一些關於吸毒成癮的人的文章。

sentences.english: Well, first, addiction is exceedingly difficult to treat and devastatingly subject to relapse.
sentences.chinese: 首先，成癮症極度難以治療，而且極度容易復發。

sentences.english: Related: " Replacing Oil Addiction With Metals Dependence?"
sentences.chinese: 用金屬依賴替代石油成癮？

sentences.english: Like any other addiction, this is an essential step.
sentences.chinese: 就像其他成癮一樣，這是關鍵的一步。

sentences.english: Steve Mirsky reportsCompulsive gambling is marked by poor impulse control.
sentences.chinese: 賭博成癮的人被認爲是缺乏對於衝動的控制力的。

sentences.english: ERIC J. NESTLER and ROBERT C. MALENKA study the molecular basis of drug addiction.
sentences.chinese: 內斯特與曼能克兩人研究的是藥物成癮的分子機制。

sentences.english: His taking to drugs was a great grief to his parents.
sentences.chinese: 他的吸毒成癮是他父母親一大傷心事。

definition: to get into a habit/to become addicted
to screen/to discriminate/to reexamine a case/screening (of applicants etc)
to show respect from a distance (idiom)/to remain at a respectful distance
unidentified origin/no-one knows where it comes from/of dubious background
